title: [K-12] Short-Term Intensive Course for Strengthening Clinical Psychology Expert Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational psychology theories and basic understanding of clinical settings
context.additional_context: Optimized content delivery for mobile learning via smartphones, with real-time case analysis and decision-making training through VR simulations

learning_goals: Analyze diverse clinical cases in a VR simulation environment and develop intervention strategies.
Perform role-playing exercises applying psychological therapy techniques (e.g., cognitive behavioral therapy) using online-based learning tools.
Measure the ability to apply acquired clinical knowledge to real-world cases through summative assessment.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
